title: Live from JPM 2026, a sit-down with Novo Nordisk’s CEO and VC Bob Nelsen
description: This week on "The Readout LOUD," a special live taping from #JPM26 featuring new Novo Nordisk CEO Mike Doustdar and biotech VC Bob Nelsen.
content: This week on "The Readout LOUD," a special live taping from #JPM26 featuring new Novo Nordisk CEO Mike Doustdar and biotech VC Bob Nelsen.
